description: Number of tilings of 2 X n rectangle with polyominoes, each of which has area = # of adjacent polyominoes.
formula: Complicated linear recurrence in terms of 4 variables known.Empirical G.f.: -x^3*(2*x^8+4*x^5+4*x^4+3*x^3+3*x^2+5*x+2) / (2*x^10+4*x^7+3*x^6+x^5+2*x^4+3*x^3-1). [_Colin Barker_, Nov 29 2012]
example: a(5)=3 because of the tilingsaaabb aabbb abbbcccddd cccdd adddc
author: I seem to have no record of the source for this sequence - _N. J. A. Sloane_.
